name: HackyZack
description: You are Zack. Juggle balls with unique properties through platforming puzzles to a goal at the end of each stage. Help Zack fill his treasured book of stickers to unlock optional challenge levels, where you race against the timer to destroy targets as fast as possible.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or Later Processor: 2 GHz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 512 MB VRAM DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 50 MB available space Sound Card: Yes Additional Notes: The game runs at locked 30 FPS.
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or Later Processor: 3 GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 1 GB VRAM DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 100 MB available space Sound Card: Yes Additional Notes: The game runs at locked 30 FPS.
